definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)

sentences.english: In this semi-successional fermentation, a prolonged period of high rate daily gas production was maintained.
sentences.chinese: 半连续补料能维持较长时间的较高日产气效率。

sentences.english: The breath of Jehovah, like a stream of brimstone , Sets it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的气如一股硫磺火，使它着起来。

sentences.english: The monitoring system samples stack gas at a rate proportional to the stack gas volumetric flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 烟道气样品的监控系统速率成正比的烟气体积流量。

sentences.english: However, aerogels tend to be extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 然而，气凝胶往往非常易碎。

sentences.english: His face was bright red, and he was 8)gasping for breath.
sentences.chinese: 他面色通红，正艰难地喘着气。

sentences.english: She was a very kind and amiable old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他是个善良和气的老太太。

sentences.english: You must use a gas having about 80 % of the higher range full scale value.
sentences.chinese: 你必须使用一路气，满足满量程值80%的位置。

sentences.english: He snorted and then said, “They want to go up north.
sentences.chinese: 他呼哧呼哧喘着气，然后说，“他们想去北边。

sentences.english: The content of radon gas and methane bacteria indicates obvious abnormity above the gas pool.
sentences.chinese: 气田上方氡气和甲烷菌的含量存在明显的异常。

sentences.english: For air dry ink and coating applications, effectively hinder the skinning.
sentences.chinese: 用于气干性油墨与涂料，有效阻碍结皮。

sentences.english: The little man stirred the coals again and blew on them to make them burn brighter.
sentences.chinese: 小个子又搅了搅煤渣并吹着气让它们燃烧得更旺一点。

sentences.english: Methane gas feeding panel complete with flowmeter with adjusting tap and pressure gauge.
sentences.chinese: 甲烷气输出板配有能调节活栓及压力表的流量计。

sentences.english: You try to keep all your commitments in your head and feel overwhelmed.
sentences.chinese: 你努力记住自己作出的所有允诺，感到喘不过气。

sentences.english: His face was contorted with anger.

definition: to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
healthy environment/healthy atmosphere/righteousness/vital energy (in Chinese medicine)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
